column4: Whenever I put a blank disk into the cd tray, a dialog pops up asking me what I want to do, is there any way to disable this "feature"? Also when I put a cd in, thunar pops up, I would like to disable this as well. I'm using xfce
have you checked the properties of the CD-Rom drive?
I havent used thunar in a whole -- right click on the CD-Rom drive - properties -- im guessing
